quick_definitions: Polynomial: An algebraic expression with non-negative integer powers of variables
Degree: Highest power of the variable with non-zero coefficient
must_remember_points: Degree is NOT number of terms
Degree of a non-zero constant polynomial is 0
Degree of zero polynomial is not defined
Fractional or negative powers are NOT allowed in polynomials
exam_traps: Forgetting to justify why an expression is not a polynomial
Ignoring the condition of non-zero coefficient
